column4: can someone reccomend a good guide/way to get a realtime kernel going in edgy?
Curious, what are you using it for?
Would it take advantage of the real time kernel, windows certainly isn't real time ( again, curious ) ?
it will utilize jack and the alsa stuff iirc....and the reason you need rt kernel is for MIDI latency..you cant acheive a usable latency >12ms or so, without real time kernel
